OnOptionSelected.name: onOptionSelected
OnOptionSelected.customFunction:
console.log("selected customer: ",additionalParams)

console.log(widgetContext)
var selectedAssetAliasId = Object.keys(widgetContext
    .aliasController.entityAliases).find(key =>
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[key]
    .alias === "page_ship_ships")

if(additionalParams=="All"){
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]={}
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]["assetNameFilter"]=""
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]["assetType"]="ship"
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]["resolveMultiple"]=true
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]["type"]="assetType"
}
else{
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]={}
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]["assetTypes"]=["ship"]
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]["defaultStateEntity"]=null
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]["direction"]="FROM"
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]["fetchLastLevelOnly"]=false

    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]["maxLevel"]=1
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]["relationType"]="Contains"
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]["resolveMultiple"]=true
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]["rootEntity"]=additionalParams.entity.id
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]["rootStateEntity"]=false
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]["stateEntityParamName"]=null
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]["type"]="assetSearchQuery"

    
}
var entityAliasesToUpdate = widgetContext.aliasController
    .entityAliases;
var selectedAssetAlias = widgetContext.aliasController
    .entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId];
entityAliasesToUpdate[selectedAssetAliasId] =
    selectedAssetAlias
    
widgetContext.aliasController.updateEntityAliases(
    entityAliasesToUpdate);
widgetContext.aliasController.updateAliases([
    selectedAssetAliasId]);

OnOptionSelected.name: onItemSelected
OnOptionSelected.customFunction:
var selectedAssetAliasId = Object.keys(widgetContext
    .aliasController.entityAliases).find(key =>
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[key]
    .alias === "page_devices_filter_ship")
    
var DevicesAliasId = Object.keys(widgetContext
    .aliasController.entityAliases).find(key =>
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[key]
    .alias === "Devices")

console.log("Important: ",widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[DevicesAliasId]["filter"])

if(additionalParams=="All"){
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]={}
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]["assetNameFilter"]=""
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]["assetType"]="ship"
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]["resolveMultiple"]=true
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]["type"]="assetType"
    
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[DevicesAliasId]["filter"]={}
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[DevicesAliasId]["filter"]["entityType"]="DEVICE"
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[DevicesAliasId]["filter"]["resolveMultiple"]=true
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[DevicesAliasId]["filter"]["type"]="entityType"
    
}
else{
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]={}
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]["assetTypes"]=["ship"]
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]["defaultStateEntity"]=null
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]["direction"]="FROM"
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]["fetchLastLevelOnly"]=false

    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]["maxLevel"]=1
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]["relationType"]="Contains"
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]["resolveMultiple"]=true
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]["rootEntity"]=additionalParams.entity.id
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]["rootStateEntity"]=false
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]["stateEntityParamName"]=null
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]["type"]="assetSearchQuery"



    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[DevicesAliasId]["filter"]={}
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[DevicesAliasId]["filter"]["deviceTypes"]=["vBox-Core Engine","Oil Condition Sensor","vBox-Core Motor","GearBox","Motor","Torque","NPGateway"]
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[DevicesAliasId]["filter"]["defaultStateEntity"]=null
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[DevicesAliasId]["filter"]["direction"]="FROM"
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[DevicesAliasId]["filter"]["fetchLastLevelOnly"]=false

    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[DevicesAliasId]["filter"]["maxLevel"]=3
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[DevicesAliasId]["filter"]["relationType"]="Contains"
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[DevicesAliasId]["filter"]["resolveMultiple"]=true
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[DevicesAliasId]["filter"]["rootEntity"]=additionalParams.entity.id
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[DevicesAliasId]["filter"]["rootStateEntity"]=false
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[DevicesAliasId]["filter"]["stateEntityParamName"]=null
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[DevicesAliasId]["filter"]["type"]="deviceSearchQuery"

    
}
var entityAliasesToUpdate = widgetContext.aliasController
    .entityAliases;

var selectedAssetAlias = widgetContext.aliasController
    .entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId];
entityAliasesToUpdate[selectedAssetAliasId] =
    selectedAssetAlias

var deviceAlias = widgetContext.aliasController
    .entityAliases[DevicesAliasId];
entityAliasesToUpdate[DevicesAliasId] =
    deviceAlias
    

widgetContext.aliasController.updateEntityAliases(
    entityAliasesToUpdate);
widgetContext.aliasController.updateAliases([
    selectedAssetAliasId,DevicesAliasId]);

OnOptionSelected.name: onItemSelected
OnOptionSelected.customFunction:
console.log("selected customer: ",additionalParams)

var selectedAssetAliasId = Object.keys(widgetContext
    .aliasController.entityAliases).find(key =>
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[key]
    .alias === "page_alert_assets")

var targetPageAlertsAliasId = Object.keys(widgetContext
    .aliasController.entityAliases).find(key =>
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[key]
    .alias === "page_alerts")
console.log("@@->",JSON.stringify(widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[targetPageAlertsAliasId]["filter"]))
if(additionalParams=="All"){
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]={}
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]["assetNameFilter"]=""
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]["assetType"]="ship"
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]["resolveMultiple"]=true
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]["type"]="assetType"
    
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[targetPageAlertsAliasId]["filter"]=    {"type":"relationsQuery","resolveMultiple":true,"rootStateEntity":false,"stateEntityParamName":null,"defaultStateEntity":null,"rootEntity":{"entityType":"TENANT","id":"9c28c0b0-b106-11ed-a5f7-cdf9aa24320a"},"direction":"FROM","maxLevel":10,"fetchLastLevelOnly":false,"filters":[{"relationType":"Contains","entityTypes":["ASSET","DEVICE"]}]}
}
else{
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]={}
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]["assetTypes"]=["ship"]
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]["defaultStateEntity"]=null
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]["direction"]="FROM"
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]["fetchLastLevelOnly"]=false

    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]["maxLevel"]=1
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]["relationType"]="Contains"
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]["resolveMultiple"]=true
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]["rootEntity"]=additionalParams.entity.id
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]["rootStateEntity"]=false
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]["stateEntityParamName"]=null
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId]["filter"]["type"]="assetSearchQuery"


    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[targetPageAlertsAliasId]["filter"]= {"type":"relationsQuery","resolveMultiple":true,"rootStateEntity":false,"stateEntityParamName":null,"defaultStateEntity":null,"rootEntity":{"entityType":"ASSET","id":"f5dc7c90-b404-11ed-b907-3bebb3a56b7b"},"direction":"FROM","maxLevel":5,"fetchLastLevelOnly":false,"filters":[{"relationType":"Contains","entityTypes":["DEVICE","ASSET"]}]}
    widgetContext.aliasController.entityAliases[targetPageAlertsAliasId]["filter"]["rootEntity"]=additionalParams.entity.id
    
}





var entityAliasesToUpdate = widgetContext.aliasController
    .entityAliases;

var selectedAssetAlias = widgetContext.aliasController
    .entityAliases[selectedAssetAliasId];
entityAliasesToUpdate[selectedAssetAliasId] =
    selectedAssetAlias

var tagetPageAlertAlias = widgetContext.aliasController
    .entityAliases[targetPageAlertsAliasId];
entityAliasesToUpdate[targetPageAlertsAliasId] =
    tagetPageAlertAlias

    
widgetContext.aliasController.updateEntityAliases(
    entityAliasesToUpdate);
widgetContext.aliasController.updateAliases([
    selectedAssetAliasId,targetPageAlertsAliasId]);
